2025 San Diego Padres Statistics

2024 Season

Record: 42-35, 3rd place in NL_West (Schedule and Results)

Playoff Odds: 65.1% to make postseason, 4.1% to win World Series

Manager: Mike Shildt (42-35)

General Manager: A.J. Preller (President of Baseball Operations & GM)

Farm Director: Ryley Westman

Scouting Director: Chris Kemp

Ballpark: Petco Park

Attendance: 1,527,110 (3rd of 15)

Park Factors: (Over 100 favors batters, under 100 favors pitchers.)
    Multi-year: Batting - 101, Pitching - 100
    One-year: Batting - 101, Pitching - 99

Pythagorean W-L: 41-36, 325 Runs, 300 Runs Allowed
